headlines.description: Ja'Quan Newton hit a running 30-footer at the horn to help Miami upset No. 9 North Carolina 91-88 in a wild finish Tuesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Newton's heave helps Miami stun No. 9 North Carolina 91-88

video.headline: Miami stuns No. 9 UNC with buzzer-beater

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCB Highlight (Miami stuns No. 9 UNC with buzzer-beater) 2018/02/27 ESHEET

headlines.description: Daniel Gafford had 21 points and 10 rebounds to lead Arkansas to its sixth win in seven games with a 91-82 victory over No. 14 Auburn on Tuesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Gafford scores 21 to lead Arkansas past No. 14 Auburn, 91-82

video.headline: Gafford goes off on No. 14 Auburn

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCB SOT (Gafford goes off on No. 14 Auburn) 2018/02/27 ESHEET

headlines.description: Admiral Schofield had 24 points and No. 16 Tennessee used a dominant second-half performance to cruise past Mississippi State 76-54 on Tuesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: No. 16 Tennessee uses big second half to beat Mississippi St

headlines.description: James Demery scored 21 points, Taylor Funk had 17 and Saint Joseph's stunned Atlantic 10 champion and No. 17 Rhode Island 78-48 on Tuesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Saint Joseph's stuns No. 17 URI 78-48

video.headline: Saint Joe's stuns No. 17 Rhode Island

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCB Highlight (Saint Joe's stuns No. 17 Rhode Island) 2018/02/27 ESHEET

headlines.description: Jalen Hudson scored 27 points and Florida throttled Alabama's offense in a 73-52 victory on Tuesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Hudson scores 27, Florida throttles Alabama 73-52

video.headline: Hudson throws down emphatic slam on Alabama

headlines.description: Jontay Porter scored a career-high 24 points, including four 3-pointers, and Missouri ended its three-game losing streak with a 74-66 win at Vanderbilt on Tuesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Porter scores 24, Missouri ends skid with win at Vanderbilt

headlines.description: Jeffrey Carroll scored 21 points, Cameron McGriff had 19 and Oklahoma State cruised past Iowa State 80-71 on Tuesday, sweeping the season series with the Cyclones.
headlines.shortLinkText: Oklahoma State cruises past Iowa State 80-71

headlines.description: Alex Foster had a career-best 15 points while pulling down 10 rebounds as Albany ran past Binghamton 71-54 on Tuesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Foster leads Albany to 71-54 win over Binghamton

headlines.description: CJ Massinburg hit five 3-pointers and had his eighth double-double of the season, Wes Clark scored 18 points and Buffalo beat Akron 80-68 on Tuesday night to secure the No. 1 seed in the Mid-American Conference Tournament for the first time in school...
headlines.shortLinkText: Massinburg, Buffalo pull away late for 80-68 win over Akron

headlines.description: Teyvion Kirk and Mike Laster had 16 points apiece as Ohio took an early lead and dominated Bowling Green 75-59 on Tuesday night in preparation for the Mid-American Conference Tournament that begins next week.
headlines.shortLinkText: Kirk, Laster lead Ohio to 75-59 victory over Bowing Green

headlines.description: Kevin McKay scored 23 points, Cecil Williams 18 and David DiLeo poured in all 12 of his points on 3-pointers and Central Michigan parlayed long-range shooting and turnovers after halftime into a romp over Ball State, 75-51, Tuesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: McKay scores 23, Central Michigan runs past Ball St. 75-51

headlines.description: Paul Jackson had 21 points with eight assists to help Eastern Michigan roll to a 74-58 win over Western Michigan on Tuesday night to clinch a first-round bye in the Mid-American Conference Tournament.
headlines.shortLinkText: Eastern Michigan clinches 1st-round bye in tourney with win

headlines.description: Kevin Zabo scored 21 points, sophomore Danny Pippen scored 17 and blocked a potential game-winning shot in regulation and scored seven points in overtime as Kent State went the extra five minutes to defeat Miami (Ohio) 90-83 Tuesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Pippen is clutch, Kent State edges Miami (Ohio) 90-83 OT

headlines.description: K.J. Maura scored a career-high 25 points with a career-tying six 3-pointers, Joe Sherburne added 13 points and three 3s and Maryland, Baltimore County beat Hartford 62-53 on Tuesday night in a battle for the No. 2 seed in the America East Tournament.
headlines.shortLinkText: Maura scores career-high 25, UMBC beats Hartford 62-53

headlines.description: Trae Bell-Haynes scored 16 points, Ernie Duncan and Drew Urquhart each added 14 points and Vermont beat Maine 74-62 on Tuesday night for its 10th straight road victory.
headlines.shortLinkText: Vermont seniors set program record with 97th career victory

headlines.description: Jahad Thomas drained 15 field goals to score a career-high 40 points and lead UMass Lowell to its third straight win, 92-77 over New Hampshire on Tuesday night to conclude the regular-season schedule.
headlines.shortLinkText: Thomas has 40 points, UMass Lowell runs past New Hampshire

headlines.description: Charles Glover and Isaiah Walton each scored 14 points and Longwood upset High Point 68-55 on Tuesday night in the first round of the Big South Tournament.
headlines.shortLinkText: Longwood takes out High Point 68-55 in Big South Tournament

headlines.description: Ty Jones scored 17 points on 8-of-9 shooting and Charleston Southern opened the Big South Tournament with a 68-51 victory over Presbyterian on Tuesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Charleston Southern beats Presbyterian in Big South tourney

headlines.description: Andrew Kostecka scored 20 points and Andre Walker added 19 with six assists to help Loyola (MD) beat Army 82-79 on Tuesday night in the first round of the Patriot League Tournament.
headlines.shortLinkText: Loyola (MD) snaps 5-game skid, beats Army in Patriot tourney

headlines.description: Matt Klinewski scored 23 points and Justin Jaworski hit 4 of 5 from 3-point range and finished with 20 points to help Lafayette beat American 93-86 on Tuesday night in the first round of the Patriot League Tournament.
headlines.shortLinkText: Lafayette beats American in Patriot League Tournament

headlines.description: Tre'Shaun Fletcher scored 20 points, grabbed 11 rebounds and dished 11 assists and Toledo walloped Northern Illinois 97-67 Tuesday night to clinch the Mid-American Conference West Division title outright.
headlines.shortLinkText: Fletcher's triple-double leads Toledo to MAC West crown

headlines.description: Marcus Foster had 20 points and Khyri Thomas added 16 as Creighton ran away from DePaul in the second half for an 82-57 victory on Tuesday night to clinch a top-six seed in the Big East Conference Tournament.
headlines.shortLinkText: Creighton beats DePaul to clinch top-six seed in tourney

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (Creighton's Foster drops the hammer) 2018/02/27 ESHEET

headlines.description: Terry Maston scored 23 points and Baylor beat cold-shooting Oklahoma 87-64 on Tuesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Maston sparkles on Senior Night, Baylor beats Oklahoma 87-64

video.headline: Baylor makes easy work of Oklahoma

headlines.description: Kenrich Williams had 16 points and 11 rebounds in his final home game for TCU, leading the Horned Frogs to their first four-game conference winning streak in 20 years with a 66-59 victory against Kansas State on Tuesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: TCU tops K-State for 1st 4-game league streak in 20 years

headlines.description: Jaylen Adams, Courtney Stockard and Matt Mobley combined to score 96 points and hit all 14 of St. Bonaventure's 3-pointers on Tuesday night to help the Bonnies beat Davidson 115-113 in triple overtime.
headlines.shortLinkText: St. Bonaventure slips past Davidson 115-113 in triple OT

headlines.description: Redshirt freshman Jalen McDaniels had 15 points and 10 rebounds, and Malik Pope returned to the lineup to score 12 points for San Diego State, which beat Boise State 72-64 on Tuesday night for its season-high fifth-straight victory.
headlines.shortLinkText: McDaniels, Pope lead SDSU to 72-64 win vs Boise State

nowFeed.headline: This is going to be a rough wait until Selection Sunday for Saint Mary's. Their at-large resume is basically one win at Gonzaga, a gaudy record (including a great record away from home) and very solid predictive/quality metrics.
nowFeed.story: This is going to be a rough wait until Selection Sunday for Saint Mary's. Their at-large resume is basically one win at Gonzaga, a gaudy record (including a great record away from home) and very solid predictive/quality metrics.

nowFeed.headline:
Arkansas senior Dustin Thomas has been dismissed from the team, effective immediately, for a violation of team rules. 

Has played at least 18 minutes in 12 of the Razorbacks' last 15 games.
nowFeed.story:

nowFeed.headline: After a couple of upsets en route to its Big Ten title, Michigan has jumped up to 14th in BPI's latest rankings. Florida also a big mover in the last week.
nowFeed.story: After a couple of upsets en route to its Big Ten title, Michigan has jumped up to 14th in BPI's latest rankings. Florida also a big mover in the last week.

nowFeed.headline: John Beilein said several teams that made deep March runs have had this type of long layoff in the past  and winning a title game at Madison Square Garden balances it out. "To play in front of that crowd, that's a once in a lifetime experience. It's worth the wait."
nowFeed.story: John Beilein said several teams that made deep March runs have had this type of long layoff in the past  and winning a title game at Madison Square Garden balances it out. "To play in front of that crowd, that's a once in a lifetime experience. It's worth the wait."

nowFeed.headline: There might not be a hotter team nationally right now than Michigan. Nine straight wins for the Wolverines, back-to-back Big Ten tournament titles.
nowFeed.story: There might not be a hotter team nationally right now than Michigan. Nine straight wins for the Wolverines, back-to-back Big Ten tournament titles.

nowFeed.headline: Nojel Eastern has had some moments this week for Purdue. Has been very good defensively, his size causing some problems for Tony Carr yesterday, being used on Zavier Simpson today. Also has six points today.

Michigan's Jon Teske has 12 points in 10 minutes so far today. 

In Michigan's last 11 games, Jon Teske had scored a combined 19 points.

nowFeed.headline: Battle of the big men so far here at Madison Square Garden. Isaac Haas has all seven points for Purdue; Moe Wagner and Jon Teske combining for all nine for Michigan.

nowFeed.headline: At one point this season Arizona State was ranked No. 3 in the AP poll. Now, after losing to Stanford yesterday, the Sun Devils have just a 23% chance to reach the NCAA tournament, per BPI.

nowFeed.headline:
I followed Grayson Allen closely since his high school days. A fierce  competitor who gave it his all. He never had one issue on or off the court. I called Duke's game last year when Grayson Allen had his tripping incident. Tonight on senior night in a win over North Carolina I loved listening to Maria Taylor's post-game interview with Allen. 
What does Duke mean to you? 
" It means everything to me, it's my love and my passion. " Allen said. 
I call that growing up.
nowFeed.story:
I followed Grayson Allen closely since his high school days. A fierce  competitor who gave it his all. He never had one issue on or off the court. I called Duke's game last year when Grayson Allen had his tripping incident. Tonight on senior night in a win over North Carolina I loved listening to Maria Taylor's post-game interview with Allen. 
What does Duke mean to you? 
" It means everything to me, it's my love and my passion. " Allen said. 
I call that growing up.

nowFeed.headline: When asked to put into words the week that was, Arizona Head Coach Sean Miller used "devastating" and "remarkable."  U of A clinched the PAC-12 regular season title with a 66-54 victory over California.

nowFeed.headline: Duke trails by 3, but it's been a night of missed opportunities - and shots - for the Blue Devils. They are 1-8 from behind the arc, including this shot, which feel about six inches short.
